scripts.misc:buildall: cd packages/common && yarn build && cd ../prisma && yarn build && cd ../trpc && yarn build
scripts.package:prisma:push: cd packages/prisma && npx prisma db push && yarn build
scripts.dev:all: yarn misc:openweb && concurrently --kill-others "yarn package:common" "yarn package:prisma" "yarn package:trpc" "yarn package:server" "yarn package:prisma:studio" "yarn package:web"
scripts.dev:bundle: yarn misc:sourcecontrol && yarn misc:buildall && yarn package:prisma:push && yarn dev:all
